title: Racing Legend Michael Andretti Bets on AI With $200 Million Zapata Merger
description: IndyCar icon Michael Andretti's SPAC has agreed to merge with startup Zapata AI, which is already helping his racing teams on the track.

title: Japan’s SBI Group partners with Ripple, but XRP price remains unaffected
description:
Japan-based financial services company SBI Group has partnered with Ripple to use XRP to expand its international payment remittances to bank accounts in the Philippines, Vietnam, and Indonesia. In a Sept. 6 press statement, SBI disclosed its plan to utilize XRP as a bridge currency between the mentioned countries. Additionally, it entered into a strategic […]

The post Japan’s SBI Group partners with Ripple, but XRP price remains unaffected appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Dips 2.65%; Network Clocks Modest Uptick in Hash Price
description: On Tuesday, September 5, 2023, Bitcoin’s mining difficulty experienced a 2.65% dip at block height 806,400, offering a slight reprieve for miners. This marks the first decline since July 26, when a 2.94% slide was recorded at block height 802,368. Bitcoin Miners See Relief With 2.65% Difficulty Drop and Rising Hash Price As of Tuesday […]

title: VeChain’s Web3forBetter: Empowering Environmental and Social Value Creation
description: VeChain introduces Blockchain Biosphere for Sustainability, aiming to create value with an environmental and social focus. The company collaborates with SingularityNET to advance AI and blockchain-powered tools. title: Polygon Price Prediction: MATIC Witnesses a Stellar 7% Uptick; Crypto AI Presale Breaks $2.6M in Funding.
description: The crypto market is abuzz with the current trend shift it is experiencing. title: Ethereum-Based DeFI Altcoin Project Ignites Rallies Amid Rollout of New Upgrade
description:
One decentralized finance (DeFi) altcoin project is surging amid the rollout of a highly anticipated network revamp. In the past there days, Synthetix Network (SNX), a protocol that allows users to trade synthetic assets, shot up from a low of $1.91 to a high of $2.51, a more than 32% increase.
